article_title: Best sales and marketing tips: PPACA
article_text:
Photo: Associated Press

Our 100 sales and marketing tips list this year is broken down into 10 important categories. We've already covered social media, old school, new school, inspirational tips, planning for tomorrow, getting back to basics, education, self help and thinking outside the box. This list focuses on that little law called the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act.

91. Be PPACA's myth buster. Most consumers (and your clients) are blissfully unaware of, or simply confused by, the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act.

Most consumers (and your clients) are blissfully unaware of, or simply confused by, the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act.

We've already covered social media, old school, new school, inspirational tips, planning for tomorrow, getting back to basics, education, self help and thinking outside the box.
